importantly I know nobody really does
this in the West but my grandparents
said you got to do this when dealing
with beef so they told me to soak the
beef in cold water submerge it in cold
water for about five hours and what
that's going to do is going to force out
all the blood and all the nastiness
inside the meat so you soak it in water
for about five hours every hour or so
you change out the water so really
